name: Slide (Oneiric Worlds)
description:
Slide is a couch multiplayer racing game with cute sliding animals. 

 A free demo is coming, so don't hesitate to subscribe to get all the news :)

The game is currently in development. It will be released on Windows, MacOS and Linux. 

Description:

Play quick & fun races with your friends. Ride cute animals through dream tracks and abuse 6 unfair bonuses to outrun the hord! Master the dive to avoid obstacles and gain boosts, and explore environments to find hidden shortcuts.

Or just take a tour and enjoy the view, while listening to the sympho-ethnic soundtrack. That's up to you.

Play up to 8 friends (or enemies) in local split-screen.

Features:

  • Play quick & fun races with your friends
  • 4 tracks
  • 4 animals
  • Split screen up to 8 players
  • 6 totally unfair bonuses
  • Learn to dive at the right time
  • Find hidden shortcuts
  • Colorful graphics
  • Easy access for kids and family
  • Eat a pizza *
  • More content to come...

*not included
